resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.

fields.summary: TiAPI: Review and clean up platform bugs and reduce bug count by 20%.

fields.description:
{html}

G2 (2.2) some G1 (1.6) some 2.1 simulator mobile sdk 1.5.0.4f5838

goes back to 1.4.1.1 at least

1.start with cell or wifi
2.nav to Platform>Network (bug already inf ro event havign been fired with no change)
3.background the app and change to another connection type
4.bring back app check values.

results: unchanged values. Not new.

{html}
fields.summary: Android: Network change events not fired with app in background

comments.body:
{html}

I'm not sure this is a valid test. But I'm going to leave it for now so we can talk through it later. Moving to 1.6.

{html}
Tested on a Samsung Galaxy S2 using TiSDK 2.2.0v20120821095711, unable to reproduce issue. Ticket marked as resolved.
Closing ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced.
